definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: A moving legend was often told around the area of Zhongxian County, Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 在四川忠县一带，则流传着一则感人肺腑的传说。

sentences.english: It’s a compelling story with a message of restraint and mercy laced throughout.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个自始自终贯穿了克己和仁慈的感人故事。

sentences.english: She will give a touching valediction at graduation.
sentences.chinese: 她将在毕业典礼作感人的告别演讲。

sentences.english: The Little Mermaid is one of Anderson's more moving fairytales.
sentences.chinese: “美人鱼”是安徒生比较感人的童话故事之一。

sentences.english: “The Namesake” is a moving study of the human side of immigration.
sentences.chinese: “同名同姓”是从人的角度来看移民问题的，很感人。

sentences.english: The moving movie made us moved.
sentences.chinese: 那部感人的电影令我们很感动。

sentences.english: Their moving story will be forever branded on the brains of us, our children and grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 他们的感人事迹将永远被我们以及子孙铭记。

sentences.english: Linda will give a touching valediction at graduation.
sentences.chinese: 琳达将在毕业典礼上作感人的告别演讲。

sentences.english: The regards shouldn’t be so careful but it must be sincerely to be moved.
sentences.chinese: 问候不一定要慎重其事，但一定要真诚感人。

sentences.english: A few years ago I read a very touching article in a magazine.
sentences.chinese: 几年前我在一本杂志上读到了一篇非常感人的文章。

sentences.english: The following is a moving story told by Hanson about the father-son relationship.
sentences.chinese: 下面是汉森讲述的一个父子情深的感人故事。

sentences.english: With the unmoving size of his body.
sentences.chinese: 借由他的身体不感人大小。

sentences.english: Each person's last day was quite emotional.
sentences.chinese: 每个人在片场拍摄的最后一天都很感人。
这是一个非常感人的故事。

sentences.english: Massa sent the Surtees family a heartfelt message on the Monday after Henry's death.
sentences.chinese: 周一，马萨给瑟蒂斯的家人发去一个感人的信息。

sentences.english: Those hooks will snap the people away according to their deeds.
sentences.chinese: 这些联系将单元人民远离根据他们的感人事迹。

definition: to move to tears (of a story)/tear-provoking (gas)/lacrimogen
to stir up emotion/to arouse sympathy/moving
eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)/extremely moved
to take care/to be mindful/(Internet slang) to be moved by sth/poignant/to have deep feelings for sb/to lose one's heart to sb
